game.title: Frozen: Journey of Ice and Snow
game.summary: Embark on an epic journey through the icy landscapes of Arendelle as you help Anna find her sister Elsa and save the kingdom from eternal winter. Solve puzzles, overcome challenges, and discover the true power of sisterly love.
game.world_setting: Welcome to the enchanting kingdom of Arendelle, where snow-capped mountains and frozen fjords set the stage for a magical adventure. Explore iconic locations such as Arendelle Castle, North Mountain, Oaken’s Trading Post, Elsa’s Ice Palace, and Troll Valley, all rendered in charming pixel art. Immerse yourself in a heartwarming tale of self-acceptance, family bonds, and the triumph of love over fear.

main_character.name: Anna Frostseeker
main_character.visual_description: A spirited young woman with fiery red hair, dressed in a practical winter outfit adorned with a snowflake pendant.

skills.name: Ice Climber
skills.description: Allows Anna to scale icy cliffs and reach hidden areas. Level 2.

skills.name: Blizzard Strike
skills.description: Unleashes a flurry of icy attacks on enemies. Level 3.

skills.name: Heart of Courage
skills.description: Boosts Anna's allies' morale, granting them enhanced combat abilities. Level 4.

characters.name: Krista Iceweaver
characters.visual_description: Wise elderly woman in a cloak adorned with snowflake patterns.

characters.name: Loki Snowsmith
characters.visual_description: Burly man with a snowflake-shaped hammer at his side.

characters.name: Freyja Snowsong
characters.visual_description: Gentle woman in a snow-white robe, carrying a staff topped with a crystal.

characters.name: Magnar Icewalker
characters.visual_description: Tall man with a rugged fur cloak and a sturdy ice spear.

characters.name: Ingrid Frostbloom
characters.visual_description: Adventurous woman with a fur-trimmed explorer outfit and a compass in hand.

characters.speaker: Grand Pabbie
characters.line: Long ago, Princess Elsa injured her sister Anna with her magical ice powers. I healed Anna and erased her memories of Elsa's abilities to keep her safe. Elsa must learn to control her powers.

characters.speaker: Grand Pabbie
characters.line: Fear will be Elsa's enemy. Love will be her salvation. Remember, a frozen heart can only be thawed by an act of true love.

characters.speaker: Elsa
characters.line: I must conceal my powers. The gloves will help me. It's time to take my place as Queen of Arendelle.

characters.speaker: Anna
characters.line: I'm so excited for Elsa's coronation! This will be great!

characters.speaker: Elsa
characters.line: No! I can't control it. The kingdom is frozen because of me. I have to leave.

characters.speaker: Anna
characters.line: Elsa, please come back! We can fix this together!

characters.speaker: Kristoff
characters.line: I can take you to the North Mountain. It's dangerous, but I know the way.

characters.speaker: Anna
characters.line: I have to find Elsa and bring her back. I won't give up.

characters.speaker: Olaf
characters.line: Some people are worth melting for.

characters.speaker: Anna
characters.line: Love will thaw a frozen heart. Elsa, I love you.

skills.name: Frost Mastery
skills.effect: Increases Elsa's control over ice magic, allowing for more intricate and powerful spells.

skills.name: Glacial Shield
skills.effect: Creates a protective barrier of ice around Elsa, reducing incoming damage.

skills.name: Blizzard Avalanche
skills.effect: Summons a fierce blizzard with icy projectiles that damage and slow enemies.

skills.name: True Love's Sacrifice
skills.effect: Strengthens Elsa and Anna's bond, granting bonuses to teamwork and support abilities.

skills.name: Encouraging Aura
skills.effect: Radiates an aura of positivity that boosts morale and resilience of nearby allies.

skills.name: Frozen Heart Defiance
skills.effect: Allows Elsa and Anna to resist negative effects and maintain their resolve in the face of adversity.

items.name: Frostblade
items.description: A magical sword infused with ice powers, capable of freezing enemies on contact.

items.name: Glacier Bow
items.description: A bow crafted from enchanted ice crystals, shooting frost arrows that slow down targets.

items.name: Blizzard Staff
items.description: A staff channeling the power of snowstorms, unleashing freezing spells to control the battlefield.

items.name: Ice Pick
items.description: A versatile tool for climbing icy surfaces or breaking through frozen obstacles.

items.title: Elsa's Powers Revealed
items.description: During the ballroom scene at Elsa's coronation, her icy powers are accidentally exposed, leading to chaos and fear among the guests.

dialogue.speaker: Elsa
dialogue.line: I can't conceal it any longer. My powers are too strong.

dialogue.speaker: Anna
dialogue.line: Elsa, what's happening? We need to leave before things get worse.

items.title: Hans's Betrayal
items.description: In a shocking twist, Prince Hans reveals his true intentions and turns against Anna and Elsa, threatening to seize power for himself.

dialogue.speaker: Hans
dialogue.line: I never loved you, Anna. It's time for me to take control of Arendelle.

dialogue.speaker: Anna
dialogue.line: Hans, how could you? We trusted you!

items.title: Sisterly Sacrifice
items.description: Facing a life-threatening situation, Anna makes the ultimate sacrifice to save Elsa, proving that true love can thaw a frozen heart.

dialogue.speaker: Anna
dialogue.line: Elsa, I love you. This is what true love means.

dialogue.speaker: Elsa
dialogue.line: No, Anna, please! Don't do this!
